Articles.Content: I really liked the look of the old styled MK1 Inline cockpit, and think that the new one looks really bland and bare. Is there a mod that changes the look of it back to the old styled model?

By "old style", do you mean the one from 1.0-1.0.2 or the pre 1.0 one? Either way, it'd just be a matter of finding an install with the version you want and copying the parts folder from the GameData/Squad/Command folder into the corresponding folder on your current install. You would need to either find someone with the old version still installed or find and install it yourself though.
